name: Waiting for Wind
description:
Waiting for wind is a casual card game about bird migration.

Your goal is to lead as many birds of your flock to Africa.

During your travels, you have to land a find more food while also avoiding predators. However, you can't just take off whenever you want, you have to wait for Wind.

Game Jam

The theme of the 2023 Meat'n'Jam Game Jam was "Travel long distance". For our entry we needed to choose a constraint. The constraint for my game was "Running out of gas" (or in my case: running out of worms.)

Credits

Sound Effect:

  • "Card Game Sounds" by HaelDB
  • "Ambient Bird, Cricket and Frog" by Blender Foundation
  • "Birdsong Carduelis Carduelis European Goldfinch" by robertopicone

Font:

  • "Noto Color Emoji" by Google

The game is written in Elm using the following packages:

  • Orasund/elm-layout
  • Orasund/elm-card-game
